EmailTemplate.description: Final leter for ATR Orders push to portal series
EmailTemplate.name: ATR Orders Send to Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Ordering: Goodbye email, hello MyAerospace!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Say hello to Honeywell’s customer-friendly portal order operation.
Honeywell’s order request email system has been replaced with a fast, easy, dependable way of doing business.
From now on, please submit orders via www.MyAerospace.com.
Honeywell's MyAerospace opens the door to a whole new level of service. Click here for instant access to great on-line training modules about placing orders using the portal: www.myaerospace.honeywell.com
Thank you. We appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace
